skills.name: CAST
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 30% Chance to Magic Burn enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: FAN THE FLAMES
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Magic Burn for 2 turns for each Burn on that target.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP.
